q: ordeal, Michael Vick agreed to a two-year deal with Unequal Technologies, a company that produces protective padding for athletes. Michael Vick struggled at times this season with an injured rib and back. Part of the reason I'm here is because I was able to wear some rib protection this season to guide me through my injury, Michael Vick said.
